verses.verse: Now <WG1161> faith<WG4102> is<WG2076> the substance<WG5287> of things hoped for,<WG1679> the evidence<WG1650> of things<WG4229> not<WG3756> seen.<WG991>
For <WG1063> by<WG1722> it<WG5026> the<WG3588> elders<WG4245> obtained a good report.<WG3140>

Through faith<WG4102> we understand<WG3539> that the<WG3588> worlds<WG165> were framed<WG2675> by the word<WG4487> of God,<WG2316> so that things which are seen<WG991> were not<WG3361> made<WG1096> of<WG1537> things which do appear.<WG5316>

By faith<WG4102> Abel<WG6> offered<WG4374> unto God<WG2316> a more excellent<WG4119> sacrifice<WG2378> than<WG3844> Cain,<WG2535> by<WG1223> which<WG3739> he obtained witness<WG3140> that he was<WG1511> righteous,<WG1342> God<WG2316> testifying<WG3140> of<WG1909> his<WG846> gifts:<WG1435> and<WG2532> by<WG1223> it<WG846> he being dead<WG599> yet<WG2089> speaketh.<WG2980>

By faith<WG4102> Enoch<WG1802> was translated<WG3346> that he should not<WG3361> see<WG1492> death;<WG2288> and<WG2532> was not<WG3756> found,<WG2147> because<WG1360> God<WG2316> had translated<WG3346> him:<WG846> for<WG1063> before<WG4253> his<WG846> translation<WG3331> he had this testimony,<WG3140> that he pleased<WG2100> God.<WG2316>

But <WG1161> without<WG5565> faith<WG4102> it is impossible<WG102> to please<WG2100> him: for<WG1063> he that cometh<WG4334> to God<WG2316> must<WG1163> believe<WG4100> that<WG3754> he is,<WG2076> and<WG2532> that he is<WG1096> a rewarder<WG3406> of them that diligently seek<WG1567> him.<WG846>

By faith<WG4102> Noah,<WG3575> being warned of God<WG5537> of<WG4012> things not seen as yet,<WG3369> <WG991> moved with fear,<WG2125> prepared<WG2680> an ark<WG2787> to the saving<WG1519> <WG4991> of his<WG848> house;<WG3624> by<WG1223> the which<WG3739> he condemned<WG2632> the<WG3588> world,<WG2889> and<WG2532> became<WG1096> heir<WG2818> of the<WG3588> righteousness<WG1343> which is by<WG2596> faith.<WG4102>

By faith<WG4102> Abraham,<WG11> when he was called<WG2564> to go out<WG1831> into<WG1519> a place<WG5117> which<WG3739> he should after<WG3195> receive<WG2983> for<WG1519> an inheritance,<WG2817> obeyed;<WG5219> and<WG2532> he went out,<WG1831> not<WG3361> knowing<WG1987> whither<WG4226> he went.<WG2064>

By faith<WG4102> he sojourned<WG3939> in<WG1519> the<WG3588> land<WG1093> of promise,<WG1860> as in<WG5613> a strange country,<WG245> dwelling<WG2730> in<WG1722> tabernacles<WG4633> with<WG3326> Isaac<WG2464> and<WG2532> Jacob,<WG2384> the<WG3588> heirs with him<WG4789> of the<WG3588> same<WG846> promise: <WG1860>
For <WG1063> he looked for<WG1551> a city<WG4172> which hath<WG2192> foundations,<WG2310> whose<WG3739> builder<WG5079> and<WG2532> maker<WG1217> is God.<WG2316>

Through faith<WG4102> also<WG2532> Sarah<WG4564> herself<WG846> received<WG2983> strength<WG1411> to<WG1519> conceive<WG2602> seed,<WG4690> and<WG2532> was delivered of a child<WG5088> when she was past age,<WG3844> <WG2244> <WG2540> because<WG1893> she judged<WG2233> him faithful<WG4103> who had promised.<WG1861>

Therefore <WG1352> sprang<WG1080> there even<WG2532> of<WG575> one,<WG1520> and<WG2532> him<WG5023> as good as dead,<WG3499> so many as<WG2531> the<WG3588> stars<WG798> of the<WG3588> sky<WG3772> in multitude,<WG4128> and<WG2532> as<WG5616> the sand<WG285> which<WG3588> is by<WG3844> the<WG3588> sea shore<WG5491> <WG2281> innumerable.<WG382>

These <WG3778> all<WG3956> died<WG599> in<WG2596> faith,<WG4102> not<WG3361> having received<WG2983> the<WG3588> promises,<WG1860> but<WG235> having seen<WG1492> them<WG846> afar off,<WG4207> and<WG2532> were persuaded<WG3982> of them, and<WG2532> embraced<WG782> them, and<WG2532> confessed<WG3670> that<WG3754> they were<WG1526> strangers<WG3581> and<WG2532> pilgrims<WG3927> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth.<WG1093>
For <WG1063> they that say<WG3004> such things<WG5108> declare plainly<WG1718> that<WG3754> they seek<WG1934> a country.<WG3968>

And <WG2532> truly,<WG3303> if<WG1487> they had been mindful<WG3421> of that<WG1565> country from<WG575> whence<WG3739> they came out,<WG1831> they might have had<WG2192> <WG302> opportunity<WG2540> to have returned.<WG344>

But <WG1161> now<WG3570> they desire<WG3713> a better<WG2909> country, that is,<WG5123> a heavenly:<WG2032> wherefore<WG1352> God<WG2316> is not<WG3756> ashamed<WG1870> to be called<WG1941> their<WG846> God:<WG2316> for<WG1063> he hath prepared<WG2090> for them<WG846> a city.<WG4172>

By faith<WG4102> Abraham,<WG11> when he was tried,<WG3985> offered up<WG4374> Isaac:<WG2464> and<WG2532> he that had received<WG324> the<WG3588> promises<WG1860> offered up<WG4374> his only begotten<WG3439> son,
Of <WG4314> whom<WG3739> it was said,<WG2980> That<WG3754> in<WG1722> Isaac<WG2464> shall thy<WG4671> seed<WG4690> be called: <WG2564>

Accounting <WG3049> that<WG3754> God<WG2316> was able<WG1415> to raise him up,<WG1453> even<WG2532> from<WG1537> the dead;<WG3498> from whence<WG3606> also<WG2532> he received<WG2865> him<WG846> in<WG1722> a figure.<WG3850>
By faith<WG4102> Isaac<WG2464> blessed<WG2127> Jacob<WG2384> and<WG2532> Esau<WG2269> concerning<WG4012> things to come.<WG3195>

By faith<WG4102> Jacob,<WG2384> when he was a dying,<WG599> blessed<WG2127> both<WG1538> the<WG3588> sons<WG5207> of Joseph;<WG2501> and<WG2532> worshiped,<WG4352> leaning upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> top<WG206> of his<WG848> staff.<WG4464>

By faith<WG4102> Joseph,<WG2501> when he died,<WG5053> made mention<WG3421> of<WG4012> the<WG3588> departing<WG1841> of the<WG3588> children<WG5207> of Israel;<WG2474> and<WG2532> gave commandment<WG1781> concerning<WG4012> his<WG848> bones.<WG3747>

By faith<WG4102> Moses,<WG3475> when he was born,<WG1080> was hid<WG2928> three months<WG5150> of<WG5259> his<WG848> parents,<WG3962> because<WG1360> they saw<WG1492> he was a proper<WG791> child;<WG3813> and<WG2532> they were not afraid<WG5399> <WG3756> of the<WG3588> king's<WG935> commandment.<WG1297>
By faith<WG4102> Moses,<WG3475> when he was come to years,<WG1096> <WG3173> refused<WG720> to be called<WG3004> the son<WG5207> of Pharaoh's<WG5328> daughter;<WG2364>
Choosing <WG138> rather<WG3123> to suffer affliction with<WG4778> the<WG3588> people<WG2992> of God,<WG2316> than<WG2228> to enjoy the pleasures<WG2192> <WG619> of sin<WG266> for a season;<WG4340>

Esteeming <WG2233> the<WG3588> reproach<WG3680> of Christ<WG5547> greater<WG3187> riches<WG4149> than the<WG3588> treasures<WG2344> in<WG1722> Egypt:<WG125> for<WG1063> he had respect<WG578> unto<WG1519> the<WG3588> recompense of the reward.<WG3405>

By faith<WG4102> he forsook<WG2641> Egypt,<WG125> not<WG3361> fearing<WG5399> the<WG3588> wrath<WG2372> of the<WG3588> king:<WG935> for<WG1063> he endured,<WG2594> as<WG5613> seeing<WG3708> him who is invisible.<WG517>

Through faith<WG4102> he kept<WG4160> the<WG3588> passover,<WG3957> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> sprinkling<WG4378> of blood,<WG129> lest<WG3363> he that destroyed<WG3645> the<WG3588> firstborn<WG4416> should touch<WG2345> them.<WG846>

By faith<WG4102> they passed through<WG1224> the<WG3588> Red<WG2063> sea<WG2281> as<WG5613> by<WG1223> dry<WG3584> land: which<WG3739> the<WG3588> Egyptians<WG124> attempting to do<WG2983> <WG3984> were drowned.<WG2666>
By faith<WG4102> the<WG3588> walls<WG5038> of Jericho<WG2410> fell down,<WG4098> after they were compassed about<WG2944> <WG1909> seven<WG2033> days.<WG2250>

By faith<WG4102> the<WG3588> harlot<WG4204> Rahab<WG4460> perished<WG4881> not<WG3756> with them that believed not,<WG544> when she had received<WG1209> the<WG3588> spies<WG2685> with<WG3326> peace.<WG1515>

And <WG2532> what<WG5101> shall I more<WG2089> say?<WG3004> for<WG1063> the<WG3588> time<WG5550> would fail<WG1952> me<WG3165> to tell<WG1334> of<WG4012> Gideon,<WG1066> and<WG5037> of Barak,<WG913> and<WG2532> of Samson,<WG4546> and<WG2532> of Jephthah;<WG2422> of David<WG1138> also,<WG5037> and<WG2532> Samuel,<WG4545> and<WG2532> of the<WG3588> prophets: <WG4396>

Who <WG3739> through<WG1223> faith<WG4102> subdued<WG2610> kingdoms,<WG932> wrought<WG2038> righteousness,<WG1343> obtained<WG2013> promises,<WG1860> stopped<WG5420> the mouths<WG4750> of lions,<WG3023>

Quenched <WG4570> the violence<WG1411> of fire,<WG4442> escaped<WG5343> the edge<WG4750> of the sword,<WG3162> out of<WG575> weakness<WG769> were made strong,<WG1743> waxed<WG1096> valiant<WG2478> in<WG1722> fight,<WG4171> turned to flight<WG2827> the armies<WG3925> of the aliens.<WG245>

Women <WG1135> received<WG2983> their<WG848> dead<WG3498> raised to life again:<WG1537> <WG386> and<WG1161> others<WG243> were tortured,<WG5178> not<WG3756> accepting<WG4327> deliverance;<WG629> that<WG2443> they might obtain<WG5177> a better<WG2909> resurrection: <WG386>
And <WG1161> others<WG2087> had<WG2983> trial<WG3984> of cruel mockings<WG1701> and<WG2532> scourgings,<WG3148> yea,<WG1161> moreover<WG2089> of bonds<WG1199> and<WG2532> imprisonment: <WG5438>

They were stoned,<WG3034> they were sawn asunder,<WG4249> were tempted,<WG3985> were slain<WG599> with<WG1722> the<WG5408> sword:<WG3162> they wandered about<WG4022> in<WG1722> sheepskins<WG3374> and<WG2532> goatskins;<WG122> <WG1192> being destitute,<WG5302> afflicted,<WG2346> tormented;<WG2558>

(Of whom<WG3739> the<WG3588> world<WG2889> was<WG2258> not<WG3756> worthy: ) they<WG514> wandered<WG4105> in<WG1722> deserts,<WG2047> and<WG2532> in mountains,<WG3735> and<WG2532> in dens<WG4693> and<WG2532> caves<WG3692> of the<WG3588> earth.<WG1093>
And <WG2532> these<WG3778> all,<WG3956> having obtained a good report<WG3140> through<WG1223> faith,<WG4102> received<WG2865> not<WG3756> the<WG3588> promise: <WG1860>
God <WG2316> having provided<WG4265> some<WG5100> better thing<WG2909> for<WG4012> us,<WG2257> that<WG2443> they without<WG5565> us<WG2257> should not<WG3361> be made perfect.<WG5048>
